TITLE: Episode 35 - Red Pill of the Week: Atop Ruby Ridge
DESCRIPTION: This week, we take a look at what happened atop Ruby Ridge. A story of entrapment, firefights, snipers, and how the federal government set up Randy Weaver and killed his family.
